content:
Sure, I can suggest some websites and cookbooks that offer a variety of healthy recipes:

1. EatingWell: This website and magazine feature healthy recipes made with whole, nutrient-dense foods. Their recipes are often nutritionally analyzed and include a diverse range of cuisines.

2. Cooking Light: This website provides healthy and delicious recipes that are easy to make, and they also offer extensive nutrition information on each recipe.

3. Skinnytaste: This website features low-calorie, healthy recipes that are big on flavor. Their recipes are often categorized by dietary restrictions and are easy to modify.

4. The Complete Vegetarian Cookbook by America's Test Kitchen: This cookbook features hundreds of tasty vegetarian recipes that are easy to prepare, and ingredients are often easy to find. They also include helpful tips on how to cook with different grains, beans, legumes, and veggies.

5. The Oh She Glows Cookbook by Angela Liddon: This cookbook is great for anyone looking for plant-based options. The meals are creative, globally-inspired and offer a variety of flavors and textures.

Remember to modify the recipes according to your dietary needs and preferences. By using these resources as a starting point, you can unlock a wealth of healthy, flavorful recipes that can make mealtime fun, tasty, and help you stick to a nutritious meal plan.
